AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.name: Dmytro Oborskyi
AboutMe.description: Hello! I'm a full-stack developer with a strong fundamentals in core libraries and frameworks, including React, Redux, Next,js, Vue.js, GraphQL, Prisma, etc. I use TypeScript in my projects to ensure maintainability, scalability, and clean, efficient code. With a passion for continuous growth, I am committed to discover best practices and staying ahead of emerging trends to deliver top-tier solutions. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and collaborate on exciting projects!
